mapper.select: select question_id,survey_id,parent_question_id,question_name, question_type,FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(question_type, 'DTFS') questionTypeShow, question_order,remark from T_DC_QUESTION where question_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_dc_question set question_name=#{questionName}, question_type=#{questionType}, question_order=#{questionOrder}, remark=#{remark}, changer=#{changer},change_time=#{changeTime},change_dept=#{changeDept} where question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: select count(QUESTION_ID) from T_DC_QUESTION where survey_id = #{id}
